affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Toggle
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.
The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.
notes:
Secondary targets will be the closest enemy units excluding the primary target.
If illusions of Medusa are created while Split Shot is active, they will also have this ability.
lore: All who encounter the cursed Gorgon will feel her rage.
name: medusa_split_shot

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing mana. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage and steals more mana per jump. Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.
notes:
Only units with mana will steal and increment the mana steal.
Mystic Snake cannot be disjointed.
attrib:
JUMP RADIUS: 475/475/475/475
JUMPS: 3/4/5/6
DAMAGE: 80/120/160/200
MANA STEAL: 20/35/50/65
INCREASE PER JUMP: 25%
cmb:
140/150/160/170
11
lore: The Gorgon's curse is her greatest strength.
name: medusa_mystic_snake

desc: Creates a shield that absorbs 60% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.
notes: Absorbs damage before any damage reduction takes place, meaning that armor will not reduce the amount of mana needed to absorb damage.
lore: While Medusa was not gifted with eternal life upon birth, her curse bestowed her with impressive defensive powers.
name: medusa_mana_shield

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.
notes:
Affects Spell Immune units.
Regardless of when a unit receives the Stone Gaze buff while the ability is active on Medusa, it will still receive the full debuff duration.
attrib:
RADIUS: 1000/1000/1000
DURATION: 6/6/6
SLOW: 50%
STONE DURATION: 3/3/3
BONUS PHYSICAL DAMAGE: 30%/40%/50%
cmb:
200/200/200
90
lore: The beauty of Medusa is legendary.
name: medusa_stone_gaze
